pets.name: Bella
pets.health-history: No known health issues, up-to-date on all vaccines
pets.behavior: Friendly, loves to play, good with children and other animals
pets.diet: No known food allergies; prefers dry kibble
pets.exercise: Two daily walks and playtime in the yard

appointments.title: Annual Vet Check-up
appointments.desc: Bella's regular annual check-up at the vet. Ensure she gets her required vaccinations and a general health check.
appointments.location: Happy Tails Veterinary Clinic, 123 Doggie Street
appointments.note: Remember to bring Bella's health card and insurance details. Don't feed her breakfast as blood work might be needed.

appointments.title: Bella's Grooming Appointment
appointments.desc: Bella has an appointment for grooming. Includes bath, nail trim, and ear cleaning.
appointments.note: Remember to bring Bella's favorite treats to keep her calm. Confirm next appointment date before leaving.

appointments.title: Bella's Training Session
appointments.desc: Bella's scheduled obedience training session with the dog trainer.
appointments.note: Bring a variety of treats and Bella's favorite toy. Discuss progress with trainer after session.

appointments.title: Dog Park Visit
appointments.desc: Taking Bella to the local dog park for play and socialization.
appointments.location: Friendly Paws Dog Park, 159 Bark Road
appointments.note: Pack water, treats, poop bags, and Bella's favorite ball. Monitor her interaction with new dogs.

appointments.title: Dental Cleaning Appointment
appointments.desc: Bella's semi-annual dental cleaning at the vet.
appointments.location: Happy Tails Veterinary Clinic, 123 Doggie Street
appointments.note: Avoid feeding Bella 4 hours before the appointment. Confirm the next visit date before leaving.

pets.name: Whiskers
pets.health-history: Mild cat asthma, managed with an inhaler
pets.behavior: Independent, enjoys cuddling on own terms, can be wary of strangers
pets.diet: Special diet due to sensitive stomach; Royal Canin Digest Sensitive
pets.exercise: Indoor playtime with toys and laser pointer
pets.grooming: Weekly brushing due to long hair

appointments.title: Whiskers' Vet Appointment for Asthma Check
appointments.desc: Whiskers has a check-up at the vet for his asthma condition. Discuss any changes in symptoms with the vet.
appointments.location: Cats' Corner Veterinary Clinic, 456 Kitty Boulevard
appointments.note: Remember to bring Whiskers' inhaler and health card. Ensure his carrier is comfortable and calming for him.

appointments.title: Whiskers' Grooming Session
appointments.desc: Whiskers' monthly grooming session. Includes bath, nail trim, ear cleaning, and brushing.
appointments.note: Bring his favorite blanket to make him feel secure. Confirm next appointment before leaving.

appointments.title: Restock Whiskers' Special Diet
appointments.desc: Time to buy more of Whiskers' special diet - Royal Canin Digest Sensitive.
appointments.note: Check for any special deals or discounts. Buy in bulk if possible.

appointments.title: Annual Vaccinations
appointments.desc: Whiskers' annual vaccinations at the vet. Includes FVRCP and rabies vaccine.
appointments.location: Cats' Corner Veterinary Clinic, 456 Kitty Boulevard
appointments.note: Avoid feeding Whiskers 2 hours before the appointment. Bring his insurance details.

appointments.title: Whiskers' Dental Cleaning
appointments.desc: Scheduled dental cleaning for Whiskers. This helps prevent tartar buildup and promotes good oral health.
appointments.location: Cats' Corner Veterinary Clinic, 456 Kitty Boulevard
appointments.note: Make sure Whiskers is well-hydrated before the appointment. Bring his health card and insurance details.

pets.name: Rocky
pets.health-history: Had hip dysplasia surgery at 2 years, currently healthy
pets.behavior: Loyal, protective, needs slow introductions to other dogs
pets.exercise: Daily long walks and mental stimulation games
pets.special-needs: Needs joint supplements for hip health

appointments.title: Rocky's Physiotherapy
appointments.desc: Scheduled physiotherapy for Rocky to maintain hip mobility and strength after his dysplasia surgery.
appointments.note: Make sure Rocky is well-rested before the session. Bring his health card and insurance details.

appointments.title: Annual Vaccination
appointments.desc: Annual vaccination for Rocky, including core vaccines and others as required.
appointments.note: Bring Rocky's health card and insurance details.

appointments.title: Rocky's Spa Day
appointments.desc: A day of grooming for Rocky. Includes bath, brush, nail trimming, and ear cleaning.
appointments.location: Paws and Claws Spa, 321 Pupper Street
appointments.note: Remember to pack his favorite treats and toys.

appointments.title: Hip Check-up
appointments.desc: A regular check-up for Rocky's hips to monitor for any dysplasia symptoms.
appointments.note: Make sure to bring his medical and insurance documents.

appointments.title: Behavior Training Session
appointments.desc: Behavioral training session with a professional to improve Rocky's social skills with other dogs.
appointments.location: Good Dog Behavior Center, 567 Good Dog Way
appointments.note: Ensure Rocky is well-rested and has had a walk before the session.

pets.name: Goldie
pets.behavior: Active swimmer, responsive to feeding times
pets.special-needs: Requires clean tank and proper pH balance

appointments.title: Tank Cleaning
appointments.desc: Routine cleaning of Goldie's tank to maintain a clean and healthy environment.
appointments.note: Ensure to temporarily move Goldie into a safe and clean container during the cleaning process.

appointments.title: Water Quality Check
appointments.desc: Regular check-up of Goldie's water to ensure it is at the proper pH balance.
appointments.note: Have the pH test kit ready.

appointments.title: Food Stock-Up
appointments.desc: Replenishing Goldie's food supply. Remember to buy standard goldfish flakes.
appointments.note: Check expiry date before buying.

appointments.title: Decoration Change
appointments.desc: Refreshing the decor in Goldie's tank for stimulation.
appointments.note: Ensure the new decor does not have sharp edges.

appointments.title: Health Check-up
appointments.desc: Annual health check-up for Goldie to make sure she's in optimal health.
appointments.location: Exotic Aquatics Veterinary Clinic, 456 Water Way
appointments.note: Ensure to safely transport Goldie in a secure and oxygenated container.

pets.name: Buddy
pets.health-history: Treated for a minor wing infection at 1 year, no current health issues
pets.behavior: Social, enjoy singing, can be loud
pets.diet: Diet of pellet food, fruits, and veggies
pets.exercise: Daily out-of-cage flight time in a safe environment
pets.special-needs: Needs mental stimulation, including toys and interaction

appointments.title: Wing Clipping
appointments.desc: Routine wing clipping appointment to keep Buddy's flight controlled and safe.
appointments.location: Feathers and Beaks Vet Clinic, 123 Avian Ave
appointments.note: Ensure Buddy is comfortable and calm before the appointment.

appointments.title: Stock Up on Toys
appointments.desc: Replenish Buddy's toys to keep him mentally stimulated.
appointments.note: Buy different types of toys - puzzle, foraging, and shreddable toys.

appointments.title: Health Check-Up
appointments.desc: Annual health check-up for Buddy to ensure he's in good health.
appointments.location: Feathers and Beaks Vet Clinic, 123 Avian Ave
appointments.note: Bring Buddy's health card and insurance details.

appointments.title: Beak Trim
appointments.desc: Routine beak trim to prevent overgrowth and to keep Buddy comfortable.
appointments.location: Feathers and Beaks Vet Clinic, 123 Avian Ave
appointments.note: Ensure Buddy is comfortable and calm before the appointment.

appointments.title: Food Stock-Up
appointments.desc: Time to restock Buddy's food supply - pellet food, fresh fruits, and veggies.
appointments.note: Make sure to buy a variety of fruits and veggies to provide diverse nutrition.
